casebody.data:
Michael A. WEISS, Individually and as Executor of the Estate of Jane L. Marsh, Deceased, petitioner,
v.
Stephen D. MARSH, as Executor of the Estate of Monroe F. Marsh, Deceased, et al.; and Michael A. Weiss, Individually and as Executor of the Estate of Jane L. Marsh, Deceased, petitioner,
v.
Stephen D. Marsh, as Executor of the Estate of Monroe F. Marsh, Deceased, et al. No. 18-1060. Supreme Court of the United States June 24, 2019.

Petition for rehearing denied.
